channel.description: Recent content in NYS:ALK on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Alaska Air Says Quarterly Profit Hurt by Fuel Costs, IT Outage
item.description: Alaska Air Group Inc.’s adjusted third-quarter profit will be at the low end of the carrier’s previous estimate of $1 to $1.40 a share, driven down by a July technology outage and rising fuel prices.

item.title: Alaska Air Says Quarterly Profit Hurt by Fuel Costs, IT Outage
item.description: Alaska Air Group Inc.’s adjusted third-quarter profit will be at the low end of the carrier’s previous estimate of $1 to $1.40 a share, driven down by a July technology outage and rising fuel prices.

item.title: Alaska Air Weighs Refinancing Pandemic Debt Facing Higher Rates
item.description: Alaska Air Group Inc. is considering refinancing $689 million of loans it took out from the US government in 2020 and 2021 during the pandemic to help pay workers, a company spokesperson said.
